MAJOR INCIDENT NOTIFICATION: Network connectivity issue in HO2

______________________________________________________________________________

_________________________________________________________________________

Date: Tuesday 11 Oct, 2024
Time: 3.39 PM GST 

 Dear Colleagues,

We are currently experiencing intermittent network connectivity issues with the Group WiFi in the HO2. 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link:https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C94c3afa6329c47eae51508dce9c16234%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638642264387483551%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=dt9%2BsT3BWlYwdUVJsQhv%2BH1VptP6l9zjvtbea6DQNCg%3D&reserved=0> .

Alternatively, you can also reach out to us via WhatsApp at +971 48045755 or utilize the chatbot available on the support portal. 

Chalhoub Tech.
